email.title: Post-Haskell Curry Night - Ticket Release
email.text:
Hi all!
Tickets for the Post-Haskell Curry Night will be released at **12pm tomorrow** (Friday 11th) on Eventbrite. We have limited spaces available, so be sure to grab tickets as soon as they release!
After you **secure a placeholder ticket on Eventbrite**, you must then **proceed to the Union website** to complete your purchase. Be sure to read the instructions below!
email.heading: Post-Haskell Curry Night

event.location: Sheba Brick Lane, 136 Brick Lane, London, E1 6RU
event.text:
Now that you've finished your first major exam at Imperial, we want you to take a well-deserved break and enjoy the delicious curry dishes of the famous Brick Lane, on us!
So whether you want to celebrate smashing the exam or drown your sorrows in tikka masala, come join your fellow coursemates at the Sheba Restaurant on Sunday 13th Jan at 5pm for a great time and great food!
ONLY first year Computing and JMC students are allowed to purchase tickets - they will be revoked otherwise.
Tickets will be released at 12pm on Friday 11th January 2019 and will cost **Â£4 / person**.
The release will be on Eventbrite, [here](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/post-haskell-curry-night-freshers-only-tickets-54499654935). **After securing a placeholder ticket on Eventbrite** please head to the Union website to complete your purchase [here](https://www.imperialcollegeunion.org/shop/club-society-project-products/computing-products/25600/post-haskell-curry-night-freshers-only).
IMPORTANT: purchases on the Union website without an Eventbrite ticket will be revoked!
